expertiseLevels.description: Basic understanding of concepts and skills. Requires close supervision and guidance. Often still in learning mode and developing foundational knowledge.
Adequate understanding and capability to perform tasks with moderate supervision. Can handle routine issues and start addressing more complex problems.
Deep understanding and significant experience in the field. Capable of solving complex problems independently and providing guidance to others.
Recognized authority with extensive knowledge and experience. Influences best practices, leads strategic initiatives, and provides high-level insights.
Pioneering expert with significant contributions to the field. Often involved in shaping industry standards, publishing research, and leading major innovations.
